name: 59 Fucks the Machine
summary:
The story contains a transfem protagonist, wiregore, uncaring gods, and some weird sexy stuff. 14k words, estimated read time 1-2 hours. Hope you enjoy.

an irritable woman named Fifty-Nine makes a journey across the sun-scorned canyons of her world and into the caves below... What is she looking for in those depths, and why is she so hard-pressed to find it?
